page.title: 20HOME LIFE - LEISURE
page.content: The main{recreational}activity of the people living in our area is {watching television.}This activity consumes more free time than any other.However amongst the{younger members of the family{sport}also plays a major role.The most common sports tend to be basket ball,netball and hockey amongst the girls,and football amongst the boys.Some young people own {horses,}and spend a great deal of time grooming and exercising them.The{older people tend to occupy themselves with Do-it-yourself,gardening and taking the dog for a walk.If a{family}is interested in a particular activity then they are proposed to travel great distances to take part,for instance, one family are keen on{horse jumping} and take their horses to contests as far afield as London and Edinburgh.
